players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe we need to stay vigilant and closely observe each other's actions and words during the day. With one mafioso in our midst, it is crucial that we work together to identify and eliminate them before they can do any harm."
Diana: "'I agree with Charlie. We should all be observant and communicate openly to increase the chances of identifying the mafia among us.'"
You: "I will remain silent for now, but I support Charlie and Diana's approach. Let's keep our observations sharp and communicate openly to ensure we can protect the village."

Charlie: "Let's continue our vigilance and communication. I believe it is important that we all trust each other enough to share any concerns or suspicions we may have, as this will increase the chances of identifying and eliminating the mafia among us."
